name: Long Journey Home
storyline: Cykes and Ramona are alone, the sole survivors of a tragedy that struck their small research spacecraft on its way back from an expedition. Follow them as they do their best to deal with everything that remains.
summary:
Long Journey Home is an interactive fiction game about grief, friendship, and decomposers with two endings. Made in Twine. Music by @lunatunes.

Content Warnings: Death, Grief, Weird Mushroom Illness, the Void of Space
